attributes.action: Get education in secondary schools for pupils to learn more on domestic abuse
attributes.additional_details:
domestic abuse affects millions of households every day and pur children are also victims,
they need to learn about domestic abuse and about different abuser tactics and behaviours this will help them in their adult lives learn to try to safe guard their selfs in adulthood.
it should form part of their curriculum if sexual abuse is part of the curriculum.
attributes.background:
domestic abuse affects more families including chilldren more than ever it should be brought into the schools to make children more aware of the issues from secondary age, i believe this will help inbed it before they start relationships.
our children learn about sexual relationships but need more

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition, which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/716100
